post:
Hello everyone,

Opening the HetrixTools Black Friday Promo warm-up, so you can start monitoring all of your Black Friday servers early this year.

This is a warm-up in the sense that stock is limited and will be extended on Friday in order to give everyone a chance two chances to grab the package they desire, however the discounts/offers will not change.

All discounts are recurring
Get an extra 17% discount when paying yearly
All stocks will be further extended Friday 29 November 00:00 UTC

Uptime Monitoring:

  • Professional: 70% OFF - $9.95 $2.99 - Stock: 10 | Coupon: BF19-U-Pro
    – 30 Uptime Monitors
    – 30 Server Resource Monitors
    – Partial White Label
  • Business: 40% OFF - $19.95 $11.97 - Stock: 10 | Coupon: BF19-U-Bus
    – 60 Uptime Monitors
    – 60 Server Resource Monitors
    – Full White Label
  • Enterprise: 20% OFF - $49.95 $39.96 - Stock: 10 | Coupon: BF19-U-Ent
    – 200 Uptime Monitors
    – 200 Server Resource Monitors
    – Full White Label

Included in all packages:

  • 1 Minute Uptime Checks
  • Domain/SSL Expiration Monitoring
  • Nameservers Change Detection
  • Public Uptime Status Page
  • Downtime Diagnostics
  • Maintenance Mode
  • Sub-Accounts

See all of the features and place your order on the pricing page:
https://hetrixtools.com/pricing/uptime-monitor/

Blacklist Monitoring:

  • Personal: 30% OFF - $9.95 $6.97 - Stock: 10 | Coupon: BF19-B-Pers
    – 256 Blacklist Monitors
    – 12 hrs Checkup Time
  • Professional: 20% OFF - $19.95 $15.96 - Stock: 10 | Coupon: BF19-B-Pro
    – 512 Blacklist Monitors
    – 8 hrs Checkup Time
  • Professional [1k]: 20% OFF - $29.95 $23.96 - Stock: 10 | Coupon: BF19-B-Pro
    – 1024 Blacklist Monitors
    – 8 hrs Checkup Time

Included in all packages:

  • Microsoft SNDS Blacklist Monitoring
  • Private/Public Blacklist Reports (+ White Label)

See all of the features and place your order on the pricing page:
https://hetrixtools.com/pricing/blacklist-monitor/

Free Monitors Giveaway:

  • + 10 Uptime Monitors
  • + 10 Server Resource Monitors
  • + 16 Blacklist Monitors

Get all of these added to your account, for free.
They’ll be persistent through package upgrades/downgrades.

How to obtain:

  • Register for a free HetrixTools account (if you don’t already have one)
  • Reply to this thread with your account’s Public Key, found here https://hetrix.tools/public-key
  • Your account will be upgraded within 24 hours

Giveaway notes:

  • This giveaway stacks with any previous giveaways and/or with your paid plans
  • This giveaway does not stack with any current Black Friday giveaways on other forums
  • Giveaway valid for the first 20 posted keys
  • Stock will be extended on Friday 29 November

Thanks everyone for taking the time to read this advertising thread.
Hope you’re all having a great Black Friday season!
